snippet: The founding documents of the New York Philharmonic — back to its inaugural 1842-43 season — are now available online.
abstract: New York Philharmonic posts documents from its innaugural 1842 season on website; $2.4 million grant from Leon Levy Foundation will allow orchestra to digitize and post its entire archive through 1970 and all public documents after 1970.
lead_paragraph: The founding documents of the New York Philharmonic — back to its inaugural 1842-43 season — are now available online.

headline.main: New York Philharmonic’s Archives Going Online
